document.full_text: federal protections for some 1,200 gray wolves in montana and idaho officially end on thursday under unprecedented legislation passed by congress last month removing them from the endangered species list.
document.title: wolves to lose federal protection on thursday
lines_and_colors: federal protections for some 1,200 gray wolves in montana and idaho officially end on thursday under unprecedented legislation passed by congress last month removing them from the endangered species list.
